      • getOAuthTokenbyAuthHeader

        public OAuthModel getOAuthTokenbyAuthHeader(java.lang.String authorization)
        get the related token from database for the provided authorization string
        Parameters:
        authorization - the authorization string containing the bearer token
        Returns:
        the related OAuthModel

      • checkOAuthReturnErrorString

        public java.lang.String checkOAuthReturnErrorString(OAuthModel oAuthModel,
                                                    java.lang.String expectedState)
        check if OAuthModel is provided and check if user called the correct URL if no OAuthModel is provided return an error string if the step is not correct return an error strinf
        Parameters:
        oAuthModel - OAuthModel provided for the check
        expectedState - the expected state due to the called URL
        Returns:
        an error string or an empty string if everything is fine
